did.unittitle: Xavier University Department of Music records
did.abstract: This is a very small collection of materials pertaining to the Department of Music at Xavier University.

bioghist.head: History of Xavier University Department of Music
bioghist.p: The existence of the Department of Music goes back to the purchase of Edgecliff College by Xavier University in 1980.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: This small collection includes chiefly brochures of various events sponsored by the Xavier Department of Music.

arrangement.head: Statement of Arrangement
arrangement.p: Materials are arranged into one folder arranged in general chronological fashion.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
